transportAdvice: The historic centro is compact and highly walkable, with most major attractions, restaurants, and hotels within easy reach on foot. Taxis and local ride-hailing options are widely available for trips beyond the center, and local minibuses connect the city to surrounding neighborhoods at low cost.

weather.description: Cool, dry, and sunny days with cold nights that often dip near freezing — bring layers for evenings.
Warm afternoons and crisp nights continue, with clear skies and very little rainfall.
Temperatures climb noticeably and conditions remain dry, making it one of the most pleasant months to visit.
Hot afternoons with low humidity and virtually no rain — ideal weather but sunscreen is essential.
The hottest month of the year, with occasional afternoon thunderstorms beginning to signal the approaching rainy season.
The rainy season arrives in earnest with frequent afternoon and evening showers that cool temperatures down.
Lush green landscapes surround the city as daily rain showers are common, typically in the afternoons.
Similar to July with regular afternoon downpours; mornings are often clear and pleasant.
The wettest month of the year — expect heavy afternoon rains and overcast skies on many days.
Rainfall begins to taper off and the landscape remains green, with increasingly comfortable temperatures.
Dry season returns with warm days and cool evenings — a popular and comfortable time to visit.
Cool and dry with festive holiday atmosphere in the city; cold nights require a jacket or coat.
